Then when it did download it took a week to load out everything, and if you ask me waiting 1 month for ONE APP is too long. attributes.review: I wanted to get this app to support my amazing misogynistic president. I thought downloading it would be the best thing since sliced oranges. Unfortunately, downloading the app caused a lot of glitches, one of which was that every time I opened the app, nothing but a picture of a soggy, hairy cheeto wearing a hat that says â€œmake america racist againâ€ would appear. It next began to have racial slurs pop up randomly on my screen before I could click on anything. It then had random videos of children crying and screaming, everytime they saw the president, MY president. Very odd isnâ€™t it?
